entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clinton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clinton 12:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -20.8°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -26.0°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
